front.title: Identifier: A Link Relation to Convey a Preferred URI for Referencing

abstract.t: This specification defines a link relation type that is intended to convey that a URI, other than the URI that provides a link with the relation type, is preferred for the purpose of referencing. Note to Readers Please discuss this draft on the ART mailing list (<https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/art>).
